shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Fәtḥa nägäśt “Justice of the Kings” (fols. 4ra-228rb) - Introduction (fols. 4ra-10rb) - Table of contents (fols. 10rb-11rb) - Ecclesiastical laws (fols. 11rb-102ra) - Civil laws (fols. 102rb-223vb) - Law of Patriarch Cyril concerning land transaction (fols. 223vb-228rb)
Additiones 1-3; colophon.

dcomments.dcomment: The dates of the completion of the Ms. mentioned in the colophon are: 7181 year of the world (=1689 A.D.), 265 year of mercy (=1689 A.D.), 1681 year of the incarnation (=1688/89 A.D.), 1405 year of the martyrs (=1688/89 A.D.), during the year of Matthew the Evangelist. The scribe modified the embedded colophon of the work including in it the dates of the completion of the Ms.

txstates.txstate: The spine cover has been cut off. The Ms. has been resewn. Hole carefully amended on fol. 22.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (8 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, cross-hatching, double sine wave with dots, braid, small-x, interlaced double line fillet with dots, corni-form).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible in the centre fold of the quires, one close to the head and one close to the tail.

squires.squire: A(3; s.l.: 2, stub after 2/fols. 1r-3v) – ፩I(8/fols. 4r-11v) – ፪II(8/fols. 12r-19v) – ፫III(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 20r-27v) – ፬IV(10/fols. 28r-37v) – ፭V(10/fols. 38r-47v) – ፮VI(10/fols. 48r-57v) – ፯VII(10/fols. 58r-67v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 68r-75v) – ፱IX(10/fols. 76r-85v) – ፲X(10/fols. 86r-95v) – ፲፩XI(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 8; 8, stub after 3/fols. 96r-105v) – ፲፪XII(10/fols. 106r-115v) – ፲፫XIII(10/fols. 116r-125v) – ፲፬XIV(10/fols. 126r-135v) – ፲፭XV(8/fols. 136r-143v) – ፲፮XVI(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 144r-151v) – ፲፯XVII(6; s.l.: 2, stub after 5; 5, stub after 2/fols. 152r-157v) – ፲፰XVIII(8/fols. 158r-165v) – ፲፱XIX(8/fols. 166r-173v) – ፳XX(8/fols. 174r-181v) – ፳፩XXI(10/fols. 182r-191v) – ፳፪XXII(10/fols. 192r-201v) – ፳፫XXIII(10/fols. 202r-211v) – ፳፬XXIV(10/fols. 212r-221v) – ፳፭XXV(8/fols. 222r-229v) – B(3; s.l.: 2, stub after 2/fols. 230r-232v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; name of the donor; incipit of the text and of its sections; incipit of the articles; abbreviations referring to other works; Ethiopic numerals; elements of the punctuation signs. On the incipit page (fol. 4r), and on fols. 5r and 102rb, a few lines are rubricated alternating with black lines.

abbreviations.abbreviation: Abbreviations referring to other works: ጀ፡ for ወንጌል፡ ዕብ፡ for መልእክተ፡ ጳውሎስ፡ ለዕብራውያን፡ ጤት፡ for መልእክተ፡ ጳውሎስ፡ ለጢሞቴዎስ፡ ትአ፡ for ኦሪት፡ ቀዳማዊ፡ ትቤ፡ for ኦሪት፡ ዳግማዊ፡ ትጋ፡ for ኦሪት፡ ሣልስ፡ ትዳ፡ for ኦሪት፡ ራብዕ፡ ትሔ፡ for ኦሪት፡ ኃምስ፡ ረስጠአ፡ for ቀሌምንጦስ፡ ቀዳማዊ፡ ረስጠብ፡ for ቀሌምንጦስ፡ ዳግማዊ፡ ረስጠጅ፡ for ቀሌምንጦስ፡ ሣልስ፡ ድስቅ፡ for ዲድስቅልያ፡ ጴጥ፡ for መልእክተ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ ቀጠግ፡ for ቀኖና፡ በቅርጣግና፡ ግንር፡ for ቀኖና፡ በግንግራ፡ ጾክ፡ for ቀኖና፡ በአንጾኪያ፡ ኒቅ፡ for ቀኖና፡ በኒቅያ፡ ኒቅያ፡ for መለካውያን፡ ቀኖና፡ በኒቅያ፡ ዶቅ፡ for ቀኖና፡ በሎዶቅያ፡ ስድቅ፡ for ቀኖና፡ በስርድቅያ፡ በደስ፡ for ፲ወ፪ቱ፡ ቀኖና፡ ዘአብሉዲስ፡ በስ፡ for ፲ወ፫ቱ፡ ቀኖና፡ ዘባስልዮስ፡ ጠስ፡ for ቀኖና፡ ዘነገሥት፡ ተጥላሳት፡ መክ፡ for ቀኖና፡ ዘነገሥት፡ ዳግም፡ መጅ፡ for ቀኖና፡ ዘነገሥት፡ ሣልስ፡ መግ፡ for ቀኖና፡ ዘነገሥት፡ ራብዕ፡ ደ፡ for ትእምርት፡ ዘዲዮናስዮስ፡ ግር፡ for ትእምርት፡ ዘጎርጎርዮስ፡ ክርስጣ፡ for ትእምርት፡ ዘክርስቶዶሉ፡ ጢም፡ for ትእምርት፡ ዘጢሞቴዎስ፡

colophon.det: The scribe modified the embedded colophon of the work in including a date for the composition of the work in Egypt, which is Sunday, 10th of Mäskäräm, 1064 year of the martyrs (= September 1347 A.D.). He included also the dates of his work: 7181 year of the world (=1689 A.D.), 265 year of mercy (=1689 A.D.), 1681 year of the Incarnation (=1688-89 A.D.), 1405 year of the martyrs (=1688-89 A.D.), 1047 [sic] year of Hijra (=1637 A.D.), during the year of Matthew.

additional.cont: Fols. 2ra-3vb, 229ra-232rb: Fäws mänfäsawi “Spiritual Medicine”, unidentified canon law text.
additional.det: Written in a secondary hand, in bleak ink. The text contains penitentiary regulations; in the explicit, it is called Śǝrʿatä qänona "Canonical rules".
The note states that the Ms. was in the possession of Kidanä Maryam.

additional.cont: Fols. 229vb-230rb: Rules concerning the schedule of the celebration of the Mass.
additional.det: Crudely written in a secondary hand; partly faded.

extras.extra: - The title of the work ፍትሃ፡ ነገስት is crudely written on the front board in large felt-tip pen. - Seal of the parish council of Golʿa Däbrä Bǝrhan Yoḥannǝs church: fols. 4r, 116r, 232r. - Crude note written in pen in the upper margin: fol. 81v. - Corrections over erasures on many fols., carefully executed in the main hand: e.g., fols. 8v, 9r, 14ra, 14v, 15r etc. - Corrected passages are written over erasures interlineally, in somewhat smaller script, in the same hand, on many fols.: e.g., fols. 11ra, 13va, 18va, 38ra etc. - Erasures marked with thin black and red lines, on many fols.: e.g., fols. 12va-vb, 13va, 20ra, 24vb etc. - Omitted letter or word added interlineally: fol. 14vb. - Omitted passage added in the upper margin (?): fol. 32r. - A sign in the shape of cross (possibly tämälläs-sign, but no omitted text passages are indicated in the margin), poorly visible, on many fols.: e.g., fols. 31v, 34v, 36r, 40r, 45r, 49v etc. - Tämälläs-sign in the shapf of two perpendicular lines, indicating where the omitted word or letters, written in the margin in a secondary hand, belong: fols. 41v, 43r(?), 47v, 50r, 52r, 53r. - A passage of the text is taken in a red frame: fol. 45v.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Rubricated quire marks written in the inner bottom corner of the first folio of the quire: ፩: fol. 4r; ፪: fol. 12r; ፫: fol. 20r; ፬: fol. 28r; ፭: fol. 38r; ፮: fol. 48r; ፯: fol. 58r; ፰: fol. 68r; ፱: fol. 76r; ፲: fol. 86r; ፲፩: fol. 96r; ፲፪: fol. 106r; ፲፫: fol. 116r; ፲፬: fol. 126r; ፲፭: fol. 136r; ፲፮: fol. 144r; ፲፯: fol. 152r; ፲፰: fol. 158r; ፲፱: fol. 166r; ፳: fol. 174r; ፳፩: fol. 182r; ፳፪: fol. 192r; ፳፫: fol. 202r; ፳፬: fol. 212r; ፳፭: fol. 222r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Rubricated notes written in the upper margin refer to the content of the sections: በእንተ፡ ጾመ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ: fol. 23v. በእንተ፡ ከመ፡ ይትመጦ፡ ቍርባነ: fol. 24r. በእንተ፡ ነገረ፡ ጉባኤ: fol. 31v. - A thread is inserted on the outer edge of fols. 31, 71, 78, 109, 120, 219.
